body.name: HOANAN 2-Pack Elastic Stretch Belt, Men’s All Size No Metal Nylon Tactical Hiking Belt
features: Fabric type Nylon Stretch Strap + YKK No-metal Buckle + Leather Tail

【OVERALL NON-METAL BELT】Our nylon stretch belt (for men and women) is made with comfy elastic material, nickel free YKK plastic buckle and soft leather treatment tail. Lightweight, high strength, wear-resistant and durable earth friendly nylon elastic for long time usage; Easy open and close belt buckle, travel-friendly belt that pass through metal detectors no alarming.

【OUTDOOR SPORTS/WORK BELT】This strong performed flex belt is no restriction of motion. The adjustable elastic keeps your pants in place and allows for the belt to be both comfortable and form fitting. Suit for playing golf, hiking, fishing etc. Also for those who need to bend down or squat during working time, like plumber. Excellent elastic waist belt for any body type!

【PLUS SIZE & ADJUSTABLE BELTS】1.5inch strap belt, 5 sizes adjustable fit- 41”( fit waist up to 36”); 47”( fit waist up to 42”); 55”(fit waist up to 50”); 63”(fit waist up to 56”); 71”(fit waist up to 62”). Extra long size belt for men big and tall. No holes webbing and removable buckles that you can DIY to cut and fit your waistline perfectly.

【STYLISH & COMFORTABLE BELT】Our Stretch nylon tactical hiking belt goes perfectly with any of your casual clothing. Whether you are pairing it with jeans and your favorite shirt or just pair it with casual pants, tactical pants, uniforms and military dresses. Our adjustable elastic belt is the ideal mix of style and comfort!

【NICE GIFT】One purchase for two Elastic Stretch belts. Comes in 5 sizes. 2 color combinations. Unisex style that to be a best gift for your family, relatives and friends in Valentine’s Day , Labor Day, Father/Mother’s Day and Christmas Day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hoanan Men's Elastic Stretch Belts, No-Metal Nylon Plastic Buckle Belts Fit for All Size Waist Product Features 1. Comfort Stretchable Strap Just enough elasticity to take the pressure off your waist, keep your pants up and stretches with any movement. It's a nice choice for those who need to bend down or squat when they’re work, like plumber, plasterer, porter, carpenter, etc. Perfectly solves the force from leather or traditional nylon belt. 2. Nickel-free YKK Plastic Buckle Which Can Be Removed No-metal buckle, nickel free means this is a great gift for those who have metallic allergy skin. Travel-friendly that pass through metal detectors no alarming. Removable buckle that allow you to trim the belt strap to any size you need. Feel comfortable and easy to wear. 3. Lightweight Elastic Stretch Belt is Your Best Choice for Outdoor Activities Tactical stretch belt is flexible and no restriction of motion, is perfect for most outdoor activities, like playing golf, hiking, hunting, fishing, camping and so on.

High Quality Strong Stretch Belt Unlike easy deformation ordinary braided elastic belt, we use high quality strong military stretch strap, no worry about deformation even use it for 10 years! Super Comfortable! Holeless Belt & Adjust To Any Size There is no holes for the whole stretch belt, so you can fixed it to the any position you want. The buckle also can be removed, so you can easy to cut the length if it is too long for you. Non-metal Buckle & TSA-friendly We use the international standard YKK plastic buckle, which is no metal, neckel free, lightweight, sturdy and durable. Quick clearance at check point, and never worry about metal allergy! Solid Sturdy Buckle & Easy Usage The plastic buckle is quite solid and sturdy for years use. Easy open and close, convenient your daily life and be ready for outdoor tactical actions.
No Hole and Easy to Adjust to Your Fit Adjustable the belt length to best fit for your waist size if it is longer for you. No restriction of holes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Low Profile, Comfortable, and Stylish
reviews.reviewText: I recently picked up the HOANAN 2-Pack Elastic Stretch Belt, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. As someone who needed a low-profile, metal-free belt for hiking and daily use, this pack delivers exactly what I was looking for.First and foremost, the fit is spot-on. Thanks to the elastic stretch design, these belts adjust to your body comfortably, providing just the right amount of support without being too tight or too loose. It feels secure without restricting movement, which is essential for hiking or any physical activity.The no-metal design is a big plus, especially for those who are sensitive to metal or need to pass through metal detectors without hassle. It's a simple feature that makes a big difference in convenience.Aesthetically, these belts look nice. They have a sleek, low-profile appearance that pairs well with various outfits. Whether I'm hitting the trails or running errands around town, these belts add a touch of style without being overly noticeable. They blend in just right, enhancing the overall look.What I appreciate most about the HOANAN Elastic Stretch Belts is how they fulfill a specific need without sacrificing style or comfort. They're exactly what I was looking for and have quickly become a staple in my wardrobe.If you're in search of a no-fuss, no-metal, comfortable belt that looks good and fits well, the HOANAN 2-Pack Elastic Stretch Belt is a top choice. These belts meet and exceed expectations, and I'm glad I found them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best belt I have got in a long time perfect for someone like me that goes through medal detectors on a daily basis I got these belt a year ago and they are still fitting perfectly I am a big guy size 42 waist and the belt stays tight and in place all day. The only thing is the elastic loop on the belt stretch out over time but still worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buckle mechanism works well
reviews.reviewText: These have good stretch to not be uncomfortable when sitting and hold snug when standing. They adjust easily. Only complaint is the band feels cheap given the stretch material. Overall look is good tho; deep brown and dark black, not faded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for outside workers
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my dad who works outside a lot. He said these have lasted him quite some time and great fit for plus size. Perfect stretch and the material is very durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not "stretch" belts as normally understood
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because stretch belts are so, so much better than regular belts. They hold up your pants without constricting you because they're always just applying constant gentle pressure. The J. Crew woven stretch belt is a perfect example of a stretchy belt like this. They're so much more comfortable than regular belts, and do a better job of holding up your pants too!Unfortunately, these are *not* stretch like that. These are basically regular nylon belts that start to stretch only when you apply *extreme* force, and they don't stretch that much either. Maybe call it "emergency stretch". When you're walking around normally, there's zero stretch. You have to tighten it the same as a regular belt. The only situation they'll stretch is if you're folding your body in half like a plumber to fix something under the sink.So maybe they're good for that, if you find yourself folding your body in half constantly? But otherwise, if you're just doing regular walking/driving/hiking, there is absolutely no "stretch" that you will experience. They will act just like a regular, non-stretch belt. These should not be advertised as "stretch" in a way that makes you think they're going to be like the other stretch clothing/belts we're used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the 2 pack
reviews.reviewText: Nicely constructed. The buckle feels a little light but it seems to be working really well. No slip, nice stretch and adjustability. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the money, a great belt.
reviews.reviewText: These belts are exactly what I wanted. They are lightweight, decent quality, have a good amount of stretch, and hold firmly. Sure, the buckle is a little cheap, but it works. For the money, a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good belt but needed trimming.
reviews.reviewText: Good stretch but less than a typical woven elastic belt. Buckle holds well. As others have said the little wrap on the end of the belt makes it difficult to thread through the buckle and it was a bit longer than I prefer. Trimmed the wrap off and cut it at an angle so that it gets through the buckle easier. Melted the trimmed areas to stop any unraveling.Good value for the money and works well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nicely finished belt with a bit of stretch. Timely delivery.
reviews.reviewText: The belt is for jeans. To wide for dress pants. Nice and light. Easy to lock and unlock but I have just bought them so I don't know how long they will last. Hopefully for a while.
The belts work as advertised when I move they still remain tight my pants stay in place
Pide una talla extra son muy cortos

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than I could have expected.
reviews.reviewText: I'm a larger guy and finding belts that fit is tough. Especially with the clamping buckles. They tend to pull apart when I sit down as I apply too much pressure on them. This is not the case with these belts. They are a solidly made nylon type material but actually have a good stretch to them. This means I don't put too much force on the buckle when I sit. It also means I am not cutting off circulation to my legs when I sit down. 100% would recommend these for anyone but especially some of the larger fellows out there.
Good product at a good price. Quick delivery, as usual,
